ing: 2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
1 (14.5 ounce) can petite diced tomatoes with chipotle
3 slices pickled jalapeno peppers, or to taste (optional)
des: "This is a salsa like you would get at a Mexican food restaurant, and is perfect with thin tortilla chips..."
ins: Place the canned tomatoes, onion, garlic, lime juice, and optional jalapenos into a blender. Cover, and blend until it reaches the desired consistency. Add cilantro and pulse until combined.
